-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]

To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4471094X] DMCA Take Down Notice

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. DMCA Take Down Notice

X-MailFrom: admin@whymarketsturn.com

Date: Fri, 8 Jun 2007 11:57:21 -0700 (PDT) 
From: Why Markets Turn <admin@whymarketsturn.com> 
X-ASG-Orig-Subj: DMCA Take Down Notice 
Subject: DMCA Take Down Notice 
To: copyright@theplanet.com 
Cc: abuse@ev1servers.net, admin@whymarketsturn.com 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="0-1160723153-1181329041=:85347" 
Message-ID: <27331.85347.qm@web81510.mail.mud.yahoo.com> 
X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net 
X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 
X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0
QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED  
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Jun 2007 18:57:43.0909 (UTC) FILETIME=[E56A6150:01C7A9FE] 

 (multipart/mixed) 
MIME element (text/plain) 
The attached and below is yet ANOTHER DMCA Take Down Notice. 
 
But REALLY!  
 
This is NOT the first notice against this same character. I have sent you MANY over
the months. And I am fed up. 
 
Unless you take real action to PERMANENTLY ban this software pirate from repeatedly
going back on your servers under ANY NAME, I will have no other alternative than to
consider that you do not qualify for protection under the safe harbor provision and
to file legal action against YOU. 
 
This is starting to piss me off to have to repeatedly send you the same notices
against the same person, for the same websites.  
 
If this person is using some proxy then you need to take action against all
accomplices. 
 
You should go out of your way to insure that I do not have to keep sending you
another take down notice. And that means if there are other websites on your servers
you should regard those as included in this or past take down notices. 
 
If I find yet another site back on your servers from this day forward, the matter
will go to court. 
 
 
---------------------- 
 
 
 
Date: June 8, 2007 
 
 
Sender Information: 
Dan Morikawa 
WhyMarketsTurn.com 
1415 S. Voss Road 
Suite 110-320 
Houston, TX 77057 
281-685-4932 
 
Recipient Information: 
Everyones Internet 
ThePlanet 
 
 
Sent via: Email 
 
Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17  
 
USC §512(c)(3) 
 
 
Dear Sir or Madam: 
 
This letter serves as my notification to you under the Digital  
 
Millenium Copyright Act that your site is infringing our copyrights  
 
as described below. 
 
1. Identity of the copyrighted work that I believe has been  
 
infringed upon. 
 
I am the owner of WhyMarketsTurn.com which publishes a software "Why  
 
Markets Turn", the website and the trademark "Why Markets Turn"  
 
#77042344 
 
 
2. Identity of the material that I claim is infringing upon the  
 
copyrighted work listed in item #1 above. 
 
Software pirate advertised http://4ts.biz on the following 
http://www.bradynet.com/bbs/poland/100119-0.html 
http://www.bradynet.com/bbs/morocco/100100-0.html 
 
 
http://4ts.biz redirects user to  
http://www.tradingsoftwareonline.com/ 
 
Reference 
http://whois.domaintools.com/4ts.biz 
http://whois.domaintools.com/tradingsoftwareonline.com 
 
 
3. Information to contact me.  
Dan Morikawa 
WhyMarketsTurn.com 
1415 S. Voss Road 
Suite 110-320 
Houston, TX 77057 
281-685-4932 
http://wwww.whymarketsturn.com> 
admin@whymarketsturn.com 
 
4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials  
 
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the  
 
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.  
 
5. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States  
 
Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification  
 
is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to  
 
act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly  
 
infringed. 
 
On behalf of WhyMarketsTurn.com, I hereby request that you  
 
immediately disable and take down the infringing materials. THIS IS  
 
A DMCA TAKE DOWN NOTICE. 
 
 
I further request a list of other domains owned by this person so I  
 
may invenstgate whether they infringe in my copyrights. 
Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter. Please  
 
advise us regarding what actions you take.  
 
Sincerely, 
 
/s/ 
(Electronically signed) 
Dan Morikawa 
http://wwww.whymarketsturn.com> 
admin@whymarketsturn.com 
 
 
MIME element (application/pdf) 
MIME element (text/plain)
